DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of its turn, the target loses HP equal to current stacks. Each turn or when applying more Damnation, double the stacks.
Temporary buffs and debuffs decay by #b1 stack each turn.
Deal #r10% less #yAttack damage per stack. Stacks multiplicatively and disappears at end of turn.
Play the #ysecond attack in #bthis NL Stance this turn twice. NL Take #r50% more #yAttack damage.
Enter the next #yStance: #yNeutral to #yPensive to #yImpetuous to #yNeutral.
If this is the first card you play this turn, gain #b1 [E] .
After gaining enough #yInspiration, exchange stacks for #b1 #yDominion. Exchange rate increases each time.
Upon gaining #yInspiration, gain #b1 block per stack.
#yAttack or #yBlock value is permanently increased by #b1 per stack.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
